verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> as <S%G4012%G99999>touching<s%> the <S%G1248>ministering<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%>, it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4053>superfluous<s%> for <S%G3427>me<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> the <S%G4288>readiness<s%> of your <S%G5216>mind<s%>, for <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2744>boasted<s%> <S%G5228>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> to them of <S%G3110>Macedonia<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G882>Achaia<s%> was <S%G3903%G99999>ready<s%> a year <S%G4070>ago<s%>; <S%G2532%G99999>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2205>zeal<s%> has <S%G2042>provoked<s%> very <S%G4119>many<s%>.

<S%G1161>Yet<s%> have I <S%G3992>sent<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G2443%G99999>lest<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2745>boasting<s%> <S%G5228>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> should be in <S%G2758>vain<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>behalf<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> I <S%G3004>said<s%>, you <S%G3903>may<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3903>ready<s%>:

Lest <S%G3381>perhaps<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they of <S%G3110>Macedonia<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G532>unprepared<s%>, <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2443>(that<s%> we <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G5210>you<s%>) should be <S%G2617>ashamed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> this <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G5287>confident<s%> <S%G2746>boasting<s%>.

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> I thought <S%G2233>it<s%> <S%G316>necessary<s%> to <S%G3870>exhort<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they would go <S%G4281>before<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> make up <S%G4294>beforehand<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2129>bounty<s%>, whereof you had notice <S%G4293>before<s%>, that the <S%G3778>same<s%> might <S%G1511%G99999>be<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> a matter of <S%G2129>bounty<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> of <S%G4124>covetousness<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> I <S%G3588>say<s%>, He which <S%G4687>sows<s%> <S%G5340>sparingly<s%> shall <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5340>sparingly<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> which <S%G4687%G99999>sows<s%> <S%G2129>bountifully<s%> shall <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G2532%G99999>also<s%> <S%G2129>bountifully<s%>.

Every <S%G1538>man<s%> according <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G4255>purposes<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart<s%>, so let him <S%G3361>give<s%>; not <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3077>grudgingly<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G318>necessity<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> a <S%G2431>cheerful<s%> <S%G1395>giver<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1415>able<s%> to make <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G4052>abound<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3842>you<s%>, always <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G841>sufficiency<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4052>things<s%>, may abound <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>:

<S%G2531>(As<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, He has dispersed <S%G4650>abroad<s%>; he has <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G3993>poor<s%>: <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3306>remains<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2023>ministers<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> to the <S%G4687>sower<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G5524>ministers<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> your <S%G1035>food<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4129>multiplies<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> seed <S%G4703>sown<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G837>increases<s%> the <S%G1081>fruits<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>;)

<S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G1248>administration<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3009>service<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4322>supplies<s%> the <S%G5303>wants<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4052>abundant<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgivings<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>;

<S%G1223>While<s%> by the <S%G1382>proof<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministration<s%> they <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3671>professed<s%> <S%G5292>subjection<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> for your <S%G572>noble<s%> <S%G2842>distribution<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> all <S%G3956>men<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> by <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1162>prayer<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, which yearn <S%G1971>for<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G5235>exceeding<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.
